channel.title: CVE Feed for GiveWP -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GiveWP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-31475|2024-09-17T03:18:38.837Z -- givewp -- givewp%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (custom plugin role) Arbitrary File Read via Export function vulnerability in GiveWP's GiveWP plugin <= 2.20.2 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2023-41665|2024-08-02T19:01:35.316Z -- givewp -- givewp
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in GiveWP allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects GiveWP: from n/a through 2.33.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-30229|2024-08-02T01:25:03.520Z -- givewp -- givewp
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in GiveWP.This issue affects GiveWP: from n/a through 3.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2022-40211|2024-07-10T19:56:23.148Z -- givewp -- givewp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GiveWP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GiveWP: from n/a through 2.25.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-35679|2024-06-12T13:42:19.307Z -- givewp -- givewp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GiveWP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects GiveWP: from n/a through 3.12.0.
